segments.text: Jim , could you do me a favor ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure , just ask . What can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: My car has a problem starting . Could you please take a look at it for me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No sweat . It ’ s a piece of cake .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Absolutely . I ’ m a great mechanic .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks for helping me out . I really appreciate it .
segments.speaker: S1
